notes.text:
This update for quagga fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2016-1245: Fix for a zebra stack overrun in IPv6 RA receive code (bsc#1005258).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: It was discovered that the zebra daemon in Quagga before 1.0.20161017 suffered from a stack-based buffer overflow when processing IPv6 Neighbor Discovery messages. The root cause was relying on BUFSIZ to be compatible with a message size; however, BUFSIZ is system-dependent.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
